TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DragEventHandler(object sender, DragEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DragEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DragEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DragEventArgs)
public delegate void DragEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DragEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 的 、 或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , or event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关与委托一起处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用委托以及事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the delegate with the event. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]
